content.text: Explain the Nen system from Hunter x Hunter

**Nen** is the power system in Hunter x Hunter - one of the most detailed in anime!

**The Basics:**
- Nen is life energy (aura) that flows through all living beings
- Users learn to control and manipulate their aura

**The 4 Basic Techniques:**
- **Ten**: Contain aura within the body
- **Zetsu**: Suppress aura completely
- **Ren**: Intensify aura output
- **Hatsu**: Express your personal ability

**The 6 Nen Types:**
- Enhancer, Transmuter, Conjurer, Emitter, Manipulator, Specialist

Your Nen type is determined by personality. Want me to explain the types or how Hatsu abilities work?

**Gojo Satoru** is arguably the strongest character in Jujutsu Kaisen!

**Key Facts:**
- Role: Special Grade Jujutsu Sorcerer & Teacher at Tokyo Jujutsu High
- Age: 28
- Known for: His blindfold and carefree personality

**Powers (Spoiler-free basics):**
- Inherited both the Limitless technique AND the Six Eyes
- First person in 400 years to have both
- His Infinity makes him nearly untouchable

**Personality:**
- Playful and cocky but deeply cares about his students
- Wants to reform the corrupt jujutsu world

Want me to go deeper into his abilities or backstory? (spoiler warnings will apply!)
What's the timeline of Attack on Titan?

Here's the Attack on Titan timeline (minimal spoilers):

**Ancient History:**
- Origin of Titans and Ymir Fritz
- Rise and fall of the Eldian Empire

**~100 Years Before Story:**
- The walls are built
- Humanity retreats inside

**Main Story Timeline:**
- **Year 845**: Wall Maria falls (Eren's hometown)
- **Year 850**: Eren joins Survey Corps, Trost battle
- **Year 850-854**: Major expeditions and revelations
- **Year 854+**: Final arc events

The story spans about 9 years total. Want details on any specific arc? I'll mark spoilers clearly!
